Title: The Dark Knight
Description: When the menace known as The Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: A film genre in which the protagonist or protagonists are thrust into a series of events that typically include violence, extended fighting, physical feats

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher Nolan is a British-American film director, producer, and screenwriter. He is known for his films that often deal with complex and philosophical themes, nonlinear storytelling, and innovative use of practical effects.

Title: Fight Club
Description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Films that explore and depict human social and emotional relationships and conflicts.

Director.Name: David Fincher
Director.Bio: David Fincher is an American film director and producer, known for his dark and stylish films, which often deal with themes such as alienation, identity, and obsession. He began his career directing music videos and commercials, before transitioning to feature films. Fincher is best known for directing critically acclaimed and commercially successful films such as 'Se7en' (1995), 'The Social Network' (2010), and 'Gone Girl' (2014).

Title: Inception
Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Films that emphasize action sequences, adventure, and high energy, often with larger-than-life heroes and villains. Films that center around science fiction concepts or themes, often set in a futuristic or otherworldly environment.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher Nolan is a British-American film director, producer, and screenwriter. He is best known as the director of Memento (2000), The Dark Knight trilogy (2005–2012), and Inception (2010).

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: A film that typically involves a journey or quest, with an emphasis on action and excitement.

Director.Name: Peter Jackson
Director.Bio: Peter Jackson is a New Zealand film director, producer, and screenwriter. He is best known for his work on The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit trilogies.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: A film that focuses on the criminal underworld or criminal activity.

Director.Name: Quentin Tarantino
Director.Bio: Quentin Tarantino is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter. He is known for his unique style of filmmaking, which often includes nonlinear storytelling, references to popular culture, and graphic violence.

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Films that center around an emotional story, often featuring a struggle against adversity. Films that center around a romantic relationship, often with a happy ending.

Director.Name: Robert Zemeckis
Director.Bio: Robert Zemeckis is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter. He is best known as the director of the Back to the Future trilogy (1985–1990), Forrest Gump (1994), and Cast Away (2000).

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Description: A meek hobbit of the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Films that emphasize action sequences, adventure, and high energy, often with larger-than-life heroes and villains. Dramatic films that center around an emotional story, often featuring a struggle against adversity.

Director.Name: Peter Jackson
Director.Bio: Peter Jackson is a New Zealand film director, producer, and screenwriter. He is best known as the director of The Lord of the Rings trilogy (2001–2003) and The Hobbit trilogy (2012–2014), both of which are adapted from the novels of the same name by J. R. R. Tolkien.
